New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 30 points, 14 assists, and 11 rebounds, marking his fifth of the season. Jamal Murray scored 28 points and became the first Nuggets player with 1,000 career three-pointers
Key Match Events: The Nuggets led 17-6 in the opening 4:10 and maintained control throughout the game. They extended their lead to 86-64 in the third quarter after outscoring the Heat 15-4 in the first 3:03. Russell Westbrook had a season-high 10 assists for Denver
